body:
For what it's worth, commit eaf5235f984080d592dbc88d6e4ad4e246e2f3b2 (fixing #14570) fixes my issue on Fedora 22/23, as its check for clang < 3.8 on kernel >= 4.1 now skips tsan tests too.

(Also, that commit's 'does -fsanitize=thread work' check would presumably also protect Fedora 22/23 against this issue.)
